menu-exit-tooltip: Close session and exit the application
data-load-error-dialog-message:
An error {{status}} occurred while loading data. The error detail is as follows:

{{message}}

Please try again later.
data-save-error-dialog-message:
Failed to save data correctly. The error detail is as follows:

{{message}}

Please review all the data carefully and try again later.
data-save-success-dialog-message: All data have been saved successfully
delete-confirmation-dialog-message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected item? This operation CANNOT be undone.
access-code-error-dialog-message: The access code {{code}} is not valid
access-survey-error-dialog-message: Attention: there is currently no active survey, so you can not access the questionnaires. Please try again when the next survey has started. Thank you.
login-create-account: Please, register now as a school
login-error-400: Access denied: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password, and try again
dashboard-card-survey-progress: Status of active survey ({{remainingDays}} days left)
dashboard-option-surveys-description: Schedule new surveys, view and / or modify existing surveys
dashboard-option-schools-description: View a list of registered schools, register new schools and / or modify their data
dashboard-option-results-description: View and analyze the answers obtained from the questionnaires, export data into CSV files
dashboard-option-access-urls-description: View the invitation URLs that can be used by students to access the questionnaires
dashboard-option-profile-description: View and / or modify my personal data and my password
dashboard-option-protocol-pdf-content: View the application protocol document in PDF format
school-section-info-content: Please, review and complete the profile data of the school. For us it is very important to have updated and concise data.
school-section-signup-ok:
Dear {{name}} {{surname}},

We have correctly received all the information from your school, so from this moment you are registered in our program.

Thank you very much for your participation.
student-survey-section-success:
Dear student,

We have correctly received all the answers in this questionnaire. Thank you very much for participating in the anti-bullying program of the Barça Foundation.

Best regards.
survey-crud-create-instructions: Complete each field of the new survey. Please note that survey periods cannot overlap.
survey-crud-edit-instructions: Modify the desired survey data without overlapping with existing surveys.
validation-question-required: You must answer this question to continue
validation-multioption-required: You must select at least one option
validation-accept-cond-required: You must accept the terms of use
validation-survey-date-conflict: Start date or end date conflicting with another existing survey
validation-survey-dates-conflict: The survey end date must be after the start date
validation-survey-ordinal-conflict: Provided ordinal already exists for the course
